local_intent: compute top grasp for white_plate, approach and align, pick with retries, verify object in gripper
assumptions: Gripper was opened by upstream nodes (consistent with GLOBAL_BT)
White plate can be made visible by a spiral scan if initially occluded
coherence_with_global: Implements the ComputeGraspPose micro-goal and subsequent approach, pick (with retry), and verification steps consistent with the Global BT and task description.
